title: Registration Opening
description: Assemble a team skilled in Bash or other scripting languages and take the first step toward victory. Registrations will be closed on 7th of September, midnight.

title: Awareness Session + Practise Round
description: Learn the rules of bashaway while navigating the platforms in a simulated battle

title: Practical Workshop
description: Elevate your skills with industry experts at IFS. Master key concepts and gain hands-on experience with cutting-edge tech.

title: 1st Round
description: The real battle begins today! Showcase your scripting skills and secure a spot in the next round.

title: Final Round
description: The sun rises over an intense battleground marking the begining of Bashaway 2024's most challenging round.

title: Award Ceremony
description: Winners will be crowned marking the end of Bashaway 2024.
